choices.C: Wait for Document Classification and Resume.

questions.question_text: Which activity should be used for classification validation in attended mode?

choices.D: All of the entities in a communication must be reviewed.
choices.B: If the entity value is correctly predicted, but the entity type is wrong, it cannot be changed.
choices.C: All of the entities within a paragraph should be reviewed.
choices.A: A single entity value can be split across multiple paragraphs.

questions.question_text: Which of the following statements is true regarding reviewing and applying entities in UiPath Communications Mining?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
A. ❌ Incorrect → A single entity value cannot be split across multiple paragraphs. Entities are extracted as continuous text spans within a single section of the communication.

B. ❌ Incorrect → If the entity value is correct but the entity type is wrong, it can be changed manually during review. UiPath Communications Mining allows users to correct misclassified entities.

C. ✅ Correct → All entities within a paragraph should be reviewed to ensure that the extracted entities are accurate and relevant. This is part of the model training and feedback process in Communications Mining.

D. ❌ Incorrect → Not all entities in an entire communication must be reviewed. The review process is typically focused on specific sections where entities are extracted rather than manually checking everything.

questions.question_text: Which of the following extractors can be used for Data Extraction Scope activity?

comments.content: Almost right, there is a form extractor

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer, there were no form extractor, incremental extractor and full extractor in UiPath Document Understanding

choices.B: Full Extractor, Machine Learning Extractor, Intelligent Form Extractor, and Regex Based Extractor.
choices.D: Regex Based Extractor, Form Extractor, Intelligent Form Extractor, and Machine Learning Extractor.
choices.A: Intelligent Form Extractor, Machine Learning Extractor, Logic Extractor, and Regex Based Extractor.
choices.C: Form Extractor, Incremental Extractor, Machine Learning Extractor, and Intelligent Form Extractor.

choices.A: Name. Data Type, Attribute name, and Color.
choices.B: Name, Data Type, Attribute name, Shortcut, and Color.
choices.D: Name, Input to be labeled. Attribute name, Shortcut, and Color.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
To add a label, click on ➕ next to Entity Label. Add the following information for the new label:

Name: the name of the new label.
Input to be labelled: choose which text component you want to be labeled. In the case of Email AI, you chose between Date, From, To, cc, and text.
Attribute name: choose label names for the entities in your data. Use this to create attributes such as customer name, city name, telephone number, and so on.
Shortcut: choose a hotkey for the label. Use this to configure a key as a shortcut. Only single letters or digits are supported.

questions.question_text: What information should be filled in when adding an entity label for the OOB (Out Of the Box) labeling template?
For an analytics use case, what are the recommended minimum model performance requirements in UiPath Communications Mining?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
"Whatever the use case, we would always recommend ensuring the following before stopping training:

That your model at least has an overall score that provides a rating of 'Good' as this means the platform considers the model to relatively healthy overall
That each of the individual factors also have a rating of at least 'Good' (as shown below)"

Link : https://docs.uipath.com/communications-mining/automation-cloud/latest/user-guide/when-to-stop-training-your-model

choices.C: Model Ratings of "Excellent" and individual performance factors rated as "Good" or better.
choices.A: Model Ratings of "Good" or better and individual performance factors rated as "Good" or better.
choices.B: Model Ratings of "Good" and individual performance factors rated as "Excellent".
choices.D: Model Ratings of "Excellent" and individual performance factors rated as "Excellent".
